SEARCH
Package us.ullberg.startpunkt.messaging

Class EventBroadcaster

java.lang.Object
us.ullberg.startpunkt.messaging.EventBroadcaster
@ApplicationScoped public class EventBroadcaster extends Object
Service for broadcasting events to connected clients using Mutiny Multi streams.

This service provides methods to broadcast various types of events (application changes, configuration updates, etc.) to all connected clients via Server-Sent Events (SSE). It includes debouncing logic to prevent flooding clients with rapid updates.
